CustomField.description: # of HCP's separating PI and HCP to establish a connection based on DX Referrals & RX Shared Patient.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 0 = No Connection 1 = Friends (HCP sent at least 1 dx-referral-patient) 2 = Friends of friends 3 = Friends of friends of friends etc.
CustomField.label: Degrees of Separation
